articles.title: EDS 411B: MEDS Capstone Course
articles.description: Master's of Environmental Data Science, UC Santa Barbara
articles.contents:
Contents
Welcome to EDS 411B
Weekly course schedule
Teaching team
Important links




Figure 1: Image: Santa Barbara, CA from Unsplash (https://unsplash.com/photos/2g378eDWjes).



Welcome to EDS 411B
The goal of EDS 411B is to facilitate student learning, work and progress on their MEDS Capstone project through lessons, activities, supervised and unsupervised project work, and peer review and feedback. Additionally, EDS 411B provides opportunities for professional and career development (e.g.Â presentation skills, writing and editing, client relations, team science, panel discussions, and conflict resolution).
Welcome!
